column2: "Na Siriahen Ben-hadad boaboaa no dɔm nyinara ano: na ahemfo eduasa ebien ka no ho
column3: na mpɔnkɔ na ntseaseanam: na osii mu kɔree kotuaa Samaria
column4: na ɔnye no koe."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Israelhen Ahab nkyɛn
column4: kɛsee no dɛ
column7: "Wo dwetɛ na wo sika yɛ medze; wo yernom so na wo mba so a wɔyɛ fɛw no

column2: "Na Israelhen no buae see dɛ
column4: ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ w’asɛm no tse ara; emi na dza mowɔ nyinara

column2: "Na abɔfo no baa bio
column4: Mbrɛ Ben-hadad ka nye yi
column6: Ampa mosomae ma wɔbaa wo nkyɛn
column8: Yi wo dwetɛ na wo sika

column2: "na ɔkyena siseber yi mobɔsoma mo nkowaa wɔ wo nkyɛn
column4: na wo nkowaa hɔn efiefi; na ɔbɛba dɛ adze biara a ɔyɛ hɔn enyiwa do fɛw no

column2: "Nna Israelhen no frɛɛ asaase no do mpanyimfo no nyinara
column4: Meserɛ hom
column6: na wɔnhwɛ mbrɛ nyimpa yi esi rohwehwɛ bɔn: osiandɛ ɔsomae ma wɔbaa me nkyɛn bebisaa me yernom
column9: na me sika ho; na mannkam no."

column2: "Na mpanyimfo no nyinara na ɔman no nyinara see no dɛ
column4: nkyii so mma mmpen."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔsee Ben-hadad n’abɔfoe no dɛ
column3: Hom nkɛka nkyerɛ mo wura ɔhen dɛ
column4: Dza ibebisaa no wɔ w’akowaa hɔ asɔpɔn no dze mebɛyɛ: na dɛm adze yi dze merennyɛ. Na abɔfo no sii mu kɔree
column5: na wɔdze asɛm kɛmaa no bio."

column2: "Na Ben-hadad somae ma wɔbaa ne nkyɛn
column4: Enyame no nyɛ me dɛm mma bi so nka ho
column5: sɛ mannsɛɛ Samaria anndan no huntuma a ɔbɔso nkorɔfo a wodzi m’ekyir nyinara nsapuw nsapuw a."

column2: "Na Israelhen no buae see dɛ
column4: Mma nyia ogu do roko no nntuw noho dɛ nyia ɔako ewie."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Ben-hadad tsee amandzɛɛ yi
column4: wɔ aber a ɔnoara na ahemfo no ronom nsa
column7: Hom mbaa mpasuar. Na wɔbaa mpasuar wɔ kurow no do."

column2: "Na
column4: nkɔnhyɛnyi bi twee piin Israelhen Ahab nkyɛn
column7: Ana ehu nyimpadodow kɛse yi nyinara? Hwɛ
column8: medze hɔn merehyɛ wo nsa ndɛ da yi; na ehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Ahab see dɛ
column3: Ɔnam woana do? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column5: Ɔnam amansin asafohemfo no hɔn mberantsɛ no do. Nna ɔsee dɛ
column6: Woana na ɔnhyɛ ɔko no ase? Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Na ɔkaan amansin asafohemfo no hɔn mberantsɛ no
column3: na wɔyɛ ahaenu eduasa ebien: na hɔn ekyir no ɔman no nyinara
column4: mekyerɛ Israelmba a ɔkanee no nyinara

column2: "Na wofir edzi wigyinae. Nna Ben-hadad ronom nsa wɔ asese no mu
column4: ahemfo eduasa ebien a wɔboaboaa no no."

column2: "Na amansin asafohemfo no hɔn mberantsɛ no dzii kan fiir edzi. Na Ben-hadad somaa akwanserafo na wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Sɛ asomdwee ntsi na woefir edzi a
column4: hom mfa hɔn enyikan; na sɛ ɔko so ntsi na woefir edzi a

column2: "Nna amansin asafohemfo no hɔn mberantsɛ no dzii kan
column3: na dɔm nkaa no dzii hɔn ekyir fi kurow no mu fiir edzi."

column2: "Na hɔn nyinara kunkum hɔn nyimpa biara a wɔnye no koe; na Siriafo no guanguanee
column3: na Israel tsiiw hɔn: na Siriahen Ben-hadad tse pɔnkɔ do nye mpɔnkɔdofo no fii nsa guanee."

column2: "Na Israelhen no fiir edzi kokunkum mpɔnkɔ na ntseaseanam no
column3: na ɔdze oku kɛse kum Siriafo."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛnyi no twee piin Israelhen no na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: na hyɛ no nsew
column5: na hwɛ dza ereyɛ: osiandɛ afedan no Siriahen no bɔfow aba wo do."

column2: "Na Siriahen no no nkowaa see no dɛ
column3: Hɔn nyame yɛ akoko do nyame; dɛm ntsi na hɔn ho yɛ dzen kyɛn hɛn no: na ma yɛnye hɔn nkɔko wɔ tɛtɛr mu
column4: ampaara nkyɛ hɛn ho bɛyɛ dzen asen hɔn."

column2: "Na iyi na yɛ; yiyi ahemfo no fi hɔ
column4: na fa asafohemfo hyehyɛ hɔn ananmu;"

column2: "na kan dɔm a ɔtse dɛ dɔm a ahwer hɔn no ma woho
column4: na tseaseanam nhyɛ tseaseanam ananmu: na yɛnye hɔn bɔko wɔ tɛtɛr mu na ampaara hɛn ho bɛyɛ dzen asen hɔn. Na otsiee hɔn ndze

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ afedan no mu
column4: na osii mu kɔr Afek

column2: "Na wɔkaan Israelmba no so
column3: na wosiesiee hɔnho na wosii mu kɔree kehyiaa hɔn: na Israelmba no kyeer nsera wɔ hɔn enyim tse dɛ mpɔnkyemba ekuw nkakraba ebien; na Siriafo no dze wɔhyɛɛ ɔman no ma."

column2: "Na Nyame nyimpa bi twee pinii bɛkaa kyerɛɛ Israelhen no see dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ Siriafo no ase dɛ
column6: na ɔnnyɛ ɔbɔn mu nyame no; dɛm ntsi mibeyi nyimpadodow kɛse yi nyinara mahyɛ wo nsa
column7: na hom ehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na wɔkyekyeer nsera
column3: ɔbaako wɔ ɔbaako so ne tsentsendo nda esuon. Na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: da a otsia esuon no wɔdze ɔko no kɔbɔɔ enyim; na Israelmba no kum Siriafo no mu anamɔnmufo mpemɔha da kor mu."

column2: "Na nkaa no guanguanee kɔr Afek kurow no mu; na ɔfasu no bui guu nyimpa mpemeduonu esuon a wɔkae no do. Na Ben-hadad guanee
column4: mpiakyir mpia mu."

column2: "Na no nkowaa see no dɛ
column4: afei yɛatse dɛ Israel fie ahemfo no wɔyɛ ahemfo mbɔbɔrhufo: yɛserɛ wo
column5: ma yɛmfa eyitam nkyekyer hɛn asen
column7: na yemfir edzi nkɔ Israelhen nkyɛn: gyangyanbiara ɔbɛgye wo kra nkwa."

column2: "Nna wɔdze eyitam kyekyeer hɔn asen
column3: na wɔdze ntampehoma bobɔɔ hɔn etsir
column4: na wɔbaa Israelhen no nkyɛn
column8: ma mentsena ase. Na ɔsee dɛ
column9: Ana ɔda ho tse ase? Ɔyɛ mo nua."

column2: "Afei mbarimba no hyɛɛ no nsew yie
column3: na wɔyɛɛ ntsɛm dɛ wɔregye no dɛ ɔyɛ n’adwen; na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Wo nua Ben-hadad a. Nna ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hom nkɔ nkɛfa no mbra. Nna Ben-hadad fiir edzi baa ne nkyɛn; na ɔmaa ɔfowee baa tseaseanam no mu."

column2: "Na Ben-hadad see no dɛ
column3: Nkurow a m’egya gyee no wɔ w’egya nsamu no mebɛdan mama; na tsetsew abrɔn ma woho wɔ Damaskɔs
column4: dɛ mbrɛ m’egya yɛe wɔ Samaria no. Na Ahab see dɛ
column5: Emi so medze ahyɛmu yi mibegyaa wo ma akɔ. Nna ɔnye no dzii ahyɛmu

column2: "Na ɔbarimba bi a ofi nkɔnhyɛfomba no mu nam EWURADZE n’asɛm do see ne nyɛnko dɛ
column4: bɔ me. Na nyimpa no poow dɛ ɔbɔbɔ no."

column2: "Nna ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ enntsie EWURADZE ne ndze ntsi
column4: hwɛ
column5: ifi me nkyɛn isi mu rokɔ ara a
column6: gyata boku wo. Na ofii ne nkyɛn sii mu rokɔ ara

column2: "Nna ohun nyimpa fofor so
column4: Meserɛ wo bɔ me. Na nyimpa no bɔɔ no

column2: "Nna nkɔnhyɛnyi no sii mu kɔree
column3: na ɔkɔtweɔɔn ɔhen no wɔ ɔkwan no mu
column4: na ɔdze n’abɔtsir kyekyeer n’enyim sakyeer noho."

column2: "Na aber a ɔhen no rutwa mu no
column3: ɔkaa mu frɛɛ ɔhen no na ɔsee dɛ
column4: W’akowaa fiir edzi kɔr ɔko no ne finimfin; na
column7: na ɔdze nyimpa bi brɛɛ me
column9: Hwɛ nyimpa yi do: sɛ ɔnam kwan biara do ma ɔyera a
column10: ɔnodze wɔdze wo nkwa bɛhyɛ no nkwa ananmu

column2: "Na aber a w’akowaa reyɛ adze wɔ ha na n’enyi nnyi no do no
column4: ɔkɔ. Na Israelhen no see no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ntsɛm yii abɔtsir no wɔ n’enyiwa do; na Israelhen no hun no dɛ ofi nkɔnhyɛfo no mu."
"Na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ egyaa nyimpa a mehyira no do ama ɔsɛɛ no ma oefi wo nsa kɔr no
column5: dɛm ntsi wo nkwa bɛhyɛ no nkwa ananmu
column6: na wo man ahyɛ ne man ananmu."

column2: "Na Israelhen no sii mu kɔr ne fie dɛ ɔayɛ kusuu na no bo efuw
